          <title>
            <string language="sl">Deli celote - ulomki (imenovalci 2 do 10)</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vaje za utrjevanje določanja dela celote.</string>
            <string language="en">Drilling exercises for calculating fractional parts of the number.</string>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perfurar exercita calculando partes fracionárias

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perforare si esercita per la calcolazione delle

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ασκήσεις διάτρυσης για τον υπολογισμό των κλασματικών 
μερών του αριθμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El perforar ejercita para calcular las partes
